title: description
Usher's Southern Hospitality: An aged variant of the Southern Hospitality. As weathered as Usher's life.

title: notes
Usher's Southern Hospitality: Southern, Comfort and a hint of turn.

title: pairing
Usher's Southern Hospitality: Usher has it with a worn Butter and cinnamon roll.

title: serving_suggestion
Usher's Southern Hospitality: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the tender sounds of Scream.
